markdown.content: About the Art

<div style="text-align: justify; position: relative">
This piece in specific started as an experiment with watercolor. I don't use watercolor a lot, so I'm not really confident in making full pieces with. Thus, this was painted on my sketchbook using multiple layers of paint with different amounts with water.

In this simple bust painting I wanted to represent how, sometimes, Mauro gets overwhelmed by the passage of time and how he feels like his life is passing faster than he can process. Thus you can interpret the use of blue and dark shades. Pixel sorting also was a technique that I wanted to try for sometime and I think it's pretty fitting in the context.
